content.description: Dr. Yang is conducting a study in which the researcher instructs participants to act cruelly or dishonestly toward another study participant. She hopes that the study will help her to understand better how different factors affect whether people obey a person who has authority.
content.question: To meet ethical guidelines, what must Dr. Yang include in this study?

choices.label: A debriefing session to explain the study purpose to the participants
A thorough breakdown of the study costs
A meta-analysis of all relevant literature on the topic
A higher level of participant compensation

content.answer: A debriefing session to explain the study purpose to the participants

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
